channel.title: Uncalled Attack
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/4760/uahead.png[/img][/center] [hr] [u][b]Introduction:[/b][/u] I am using a Project Insanity source for this project. I have been developing this project for a few months now, and never made a thread, as there was not much quality codes added into the server to post about. Now that I have what I need, I can finally post a thread about it.
This project will have many additions on it, and not using poorly coded tutorials. I haven't used a single tutorial on this source yet, I don't plan on it either.
[u][b]What We Have:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]50% Firemaking skill (able to train) [/li][li]Quest Tab voting method [/li][li]85% Woodcutting skill [/li][li]35% Agility skill (able to train) [/li][li]100% RuneCrafting skill (done much editing) [/li][li]A fixed ::noclip command whether they add it to the client or not [/li][li]Better logging in and out methods [/li][li]40% Turmoil prayer [/li][li]55% Soul Split prayer [/li][li]A better ::yell command [/li][li]Edited Barrows minigame [/li][li]Repeating message [/li][li]Fixed friends list on a webclient [/li][li]Edited the hit system [/li][li]Fixed duping methods [/li][li]Fixed the Jad minigame [/li][li]60% Clipped NPCs [/li][li]15% Clipped following [/li][li]Fixed mute command [/li][li]100% working barrows armor effects [/li][li]Cleaned up files, eliminating them of pointless codes [/li][/ul]
I will keep this part updated when I add more.
[u][b]Images:[/b][/u] [img]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/9702/votingquesttab.png[/img] [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/7500/repeatingmessage.png[/img] [img]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/2809/barrows1.png[/img] [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/4615/barrows2e.png[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/5504/screen5ka.png[/img] [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/1198/turmoil1.png[/img] [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/8262/turmoil2.png[/img] [img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/5972/jadminigame.png[/img] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/3282/webclientfriendlist.png[/img] Was showing the fixed friends list on image above. [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/282/ua1.png[/img] [img]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/9953/ua2.png[/img] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/7268/ua3.png[/img] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/1451/ua4.png[/img] [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/6562/ua5.png[/img] [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/4458/ua6g.png[/img] [img]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/488/ua7.png[/img] [img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/2420/ua8.png[/img] [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/8818/ua9.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/6906/ua10.png[/img] [img]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/9421/ua11.png[/img] [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/2265/ua12.png[/img] [img]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/9449/ua13.png[/img] [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/4276/ua14.png[/img] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/558/ua15.png[/img] [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/9452/turmoil.gif[/img] [img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/8749/uagif1.gif[/img] [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/8475/uagif3.gif[/img] [img]http://i934.photobucket.com/albums/ad181/kilop192/UA-GIF2.gif[/img] But I'm going to keep this updated as often as I can.
Do not ask to join the development team, I'm the only server programmer and I will always be the only one. I have codes in my server that I'd like nobody else to see, or get released. If you guys will see it, then you might leech it; that's why I'm not accepting anyone to the team.

item.title: Uncalled Attack
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[center][/center]
[hr]
Introduction:
I am using a Project Insanity source for this project.
I have been developing this project for a few months now, and never made a thread, as there was not much quality codes added into the server to post about.
Now that I have what I need, I can finally post a thread about it.

This project will have many additions on it, and not using poorly coded tutorials.
I haven’t used a single tutorial on this source yet, I don’t plan on it either.

What We Have:

[ul][li]50% Firemaking skill (able to train)
[/li][li]Quest Tab voting method
[/li][li]85% Woodcutting skill
[/li][li]35% Agility skill (able to train)
[/li][li]100% RuneCrafting skill (done much editing)
[/li][li]A fixed ::noclip command whether they add it to the client or not
[/li][li]Better logging in and out methods
[/li][li]40% Turmoil prayer
[/li][li]55% Soul Split prayer
[/li][li]A better ::yell command
[/li][li]Edited Barrows minigame
[/li][li]Repeating message
[/li][li]Fixed friends list on a webclient
[/li][li]Edited the hit system
[/li][li]Fixed duping methods
[/li][li]Fixed the Jad minigame
[/li][li]60% Clipped NPCs
[/li][li]15% Clipped following
[/li][li]Fixed mute command
[/li][li]100% working barrows armor effects
[/li][li]Cleaned up files, eliminating them of pointless codes
[/li][/ul]

I will keep this part updated when I add more.

Images:









Was showing the fixed friends list on image above.



















But I’m going to keep this updated as often as I can.

Do not ask to join the development team, I’m the only server programmer and I will always be the only one.
I have codes in my server that I’d like nobody else to see, or get released.
If you guys will see it, then you might leech it; that’s why I’m not accepting anyone to the team.

Read full topic
